website_summaries.verdict: A good choice if you're a fan of faux leather, but similarly priced futons stand out a bit more for their durability and quality.
pros: The attractive faux leather material enhances any room's appearance and is easy to clean
cons: At least one customer complains that pieces were missing or did not fit together properly when the unit arrived

customer_reviews.title: Great couch!!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this couch for my husband to put in his garage/man cave. It is a faux leather, so easy clean up. He loved the cup holders, so his friends can have a drink when visiting. He also liked that it can fold down into a futon - we plan on using for our camping trips. It arrived in one large box, and was super easy to put together- (I think it took my daughter and I about 10 minutes). Quality seems pretty good - but for this price, I didn't have high expectations. We may buy another one for the basement!
customer_reviews.author: LINDA L

customer_reviews.title: Mediocre couch.... wish I could get a refund for something like this...
customer_reviews.text: I am not too impressed with this couch. I bought it to replace a foam futon I bought from Walmart two years ago for 89 dollars. The leather on this couch feels fine. And I feel like it is durable and able to support my weight. However. The drink holders in the arm are too big to rest comfortably down on the futon. Makes the portion of it completely useless. I was excited for this couch but could say that I'm quite disappointed with the result.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Treysman

customer_reviews.title: Amazing product. the advertisement may make the couch look ...
customer_reviews.text: Amazing product. the advertisement may make the couch look larger than it is. I bought this for my bedroom and it is as wide as a King size mattress. so it fits perfectly at the end of the bed. perfect bedroom couch, VERY EASY TO PUT TOGETHER!!!
customer_reviews.author: ADAAI

customer_reviews.title: Absolute garbage. DO NOT BUY.
customer_reviews.text: Three and a half months in and one back is broken. Just hangs about halfway. The arms are already very loose as well giving 3 inches or so sideways. I would not recommend this product. Update: And now 2 days after writing this review one of the arms just fell off. Absolute garbage.
customer_reviews.author: Roger Burrell

customer_reviews.title: Great buy
customer_reviews.text: The price itself is a steal! I'm currently in the military so anything of convenience is superb, I left to work 20min prior the package showing up. My wife assembled it within 30min, she said she was confused at first due to not seeing the legs or any assembly items. Then she found em within the futon. It is a little stiff but easily broken in and over a great living room couch/bed for guests who spend the night.
customer_reviews.author: AngelM

customer_reviews.title: Best Futon in this Price Range
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely amazing futon. I have had it for about a month and have had no issues. I have read that the futon is uncomfortable, but I think it is extremely comfortable even at six-feet. I would definitely recommend this to anyone in a small apartment or a man-cave. The ONE issue I have is that my back will occasionally stick to the leather, but I remedied that with a similar colored blanket to cover it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I would definitely not recommend this couch to anyone
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to put in my living room when I was putting my house on the market for sale. One side of the back was broken when it arrived, the box was so flimsy that there was no way to package it back up to return it. It is EXTREMELY uncomfortable and the arms do not come down level so you cannot use the drink holders. I would definitely not recommend this couch to anyone.
customer_reviews.author: LYWfromKs

customer_reviews.title: Cheap!  Not worth it!!
customer_reviews.text: Not very comfortable at all. It feels like springs when you sit down. Also the arm rests won't sit flat, they sit at an angle because of the cheapness of this futon. And they're not very deep, so if you have a full glass it could very easily spill and almost anything could be barely touched and fall completely out. Save your money. Do not buy this cheap crap
customer_reviews.author: Nicole

customer_reviews.title: Awesome - better than expected
customer_reviews.text: Awesome - better than expected. Love it! Also, for whoever said the legs were missing, they are actually in a zippered pocket in/under the couch. quick easy set up and looks great!
customer_reviews.author: Victoria Benson

customer_reviews.title: A great example of why you should never buy furniture before ...
customer_reviews.text: A great example of why you should never buy furniture before testing it personally. The couch simply isn't comfortable or soft.
customer_reviews.author: J Mathews

customer_reviews.title: Good for again a wall...
customer_reviews.text: Unless you are going to put this against a wall, make sure to know that the bottom back will show the screws from the legs which is not flattering. the arms also do not lay flat. It's ok for the price but I would not buy it again.
customer_reviews.author: M. Reynolds

customer_reviews.title: Uncomfortable and falls apart within weeks.
customer_reviews.text: For the price, I didn't expect a luxurious sofa. But, it is sooo cheaply made and utterly uncomfortable. The futon arrived on Sept 27 and was assembled the following day. Less than two months of use (Nov 19), one of the arms completely fell off. If it was $25, I wouldn't buy it again.
customer_reviews.author: Kristy Hitesman

customer_reviews.title: Definitely look around before purchasing this “Best Choice “
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my living room. My 10 year old boy wanted to spend weekend nights on the futon, most uncomfortable futon I’ve ever sat on, he sleeps in his room because it’s so uncomfortable! Bought a Walmart futon a few years ago for like $80.00 way more comfortable. P.S. you can’t set a drink in the “drink holders”
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Came damaged.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this couch because a friend of mine bought it. Even though it looks decent, it came with a lot of damages (included in the picture). I really wish I could return it for an undamaged piece but the hassle of returning this heavy couch etc is just too much! I'm disappointed at the manufacturers! Wish they would compensate me some way for the defective product!
customer_reviews.author: Mish

customer_reviews.title: Great for the money also easy to put together just ...
customer_reviews.text: Great for the money also easy to put together just 4 screws .looks great very retro and a spare bed can't go wrong amazon never disappoints love it .
customer_reviews.author: slawdawg

customer_reviews.title: Some flaws but ok
customer_reviews.text: This futon is perfect for my family. It’s almost like an upholstered bench. The arm rests are too big and the back of the bottom of the futon I wish had a hard cover and not open metal rail and screws.
customer_reviews.author: Ashley

customer_reviews.title: The only time the back has good support is when the futon is against a wall
customer_reviews.text: The backs of the futon are very flimsy. When the backs are at an angle the arms/cup holder do not sit level, they are also at angles. So, that kind of defeats the purpose of them because drinks can fall right out. The only time the back has good support is when the futon is against a wall. Will be returning and getting a better quality futon elsewhere.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle

customer_reviews.title: NOT WORTH IT
customer_reviews.text: Just got the futon and it was all messed up holes in the back one of the bars are bent so have to do extra work to put together b.s. that's what this is DO NOT I REPEAT DON'T NOT WASTE YOUR TIME OR MONEY SEE THIS MOVE ON NOT WORTH IT
customer_reviews.author: Richard b.

customer_reviews.title: Great quality! Great Price! easy to put together!
customer_reviews.text: Wayyyy better than expected!!! Price is great and so is quality!! Looks great in a teenagers bedroom who is so cool she needs a couch! LOL!!
customer_reviews.author: Joy Monaco

customer_reviews.title: Decent
customer_reviews.text: Not the most comfortable ... I use it in my office as extra seating ... not bad for a quick nap, but wouldn't want to sleep on this for long ... easy to put together
customer_reviews.author: Nick

customer_reviews.title: Screws underneath will come out Kind of uncomfortable to be ...
customer_reviews.text: Screws underneath will come out Kind of uncomfortable to be on honestly Will put this in my room in my next apartment Don’t get it if you are always on the couch
customer_reviews.author: Anthony Kuzibaev

customer_reviews.title: Easy to assemble
customer_reviews.text: Took longer than expected to arrive. Easy to assemble. Had it since May. There is a dip in the couch already. Not very sturdy. You get what u pay for.
customer_reviews.author: Emma

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Bought for my son for his college dorm room and it has held up well
customer_reviews.author: A. morlock

customer_reviews.title: Not great, but not bad
customer_reviews.text: Looks OK, not cheep,looking. Easy to assemble and fold up down. But very firm. Not but so comfortable to sit on, too hard to sleep on. Even our college age son who used to sleep on the dorm floor thought it was excessively firm.
customer_reviews.author: Bigflip

customer_reviews.title: not very pleased
customer_reviews.text: I am displeased. Item came ripped, didn't fit together as it was supposed to, couldn't secure the connectors immediately. However, after hammering the frame into the connector, I was able to stick a screwdriver in the hole long enough to secure one bolt into it. It arrived missing a bolt, so I couldn’t secure it properly. Overall, not very pleased
customer_reviews.author: David Murphy

customer_reviews.title: however the price point was good and reflects the product
customer_reviews.text: Was cheaply made, the cup holders on the armrest the material was cut too short and you can see the stuffing....however the price point was good and reflects the product.
customer_reviews.author: Christine Olson

customer_reviews.title: They love them, and they have already had friends spend ...
customer_reviews.text: I purchased two of these for my grandsons. They love them, and they have already had friends spend the night on them. Seems well built.
customer_reviews.author: Terri May

customer_reviews.title: Great purchase for the price
customer_reviews.text: Great purchase for the price! I expect this to last a few years at least and glad we chose this one. It's a great fit for the RV that it went in and looks great! Easy to clean! Not cheap looking!
customer_reviews.author: tamara loggins

customer_reviews.title: Some shipping damage
customer_reviews.text: So, its not the worst to sit on, however it was a bit damaged upon arrival. The pocket area was ripped open and the fabric underneath torn in spots as well. There is also a small seam on the front corner that is coming undone, but i was planning on covering the futon anyway. I would not use it to sleep myself, but it works for when my brother visits.
customer_reviews.author: Jesse Mundt

customer_reviews.title: No legs? Im screwed....oh wait no screws either...
customer_reviews.text: So...it shipped fast but I'm missing the screws and the legs...also there's this huge tear in a zipped up pocket on the bottom of one side of the futon, I'm assuming that's where the legs to my futon and my screws went...since I can't fully assemble it yet, I can't give it a proper review but it looks like a decent size and it wasn't super heavy thank God, I would've been real disappointed hauling this thing up a flight of stairs just to find out I'm missing the pieces to it
customer_reviews.author: Dorain

customer_reviews.title: Not worth it at all.
customer_reviews.text: Dont buy this futon, it's horrible. The sellers are great with communicating but this is horribly made. It arrived with scratches and holes and the next day the arm fell off.
customer_reviews.author: Fashiioniistax

customer_reviews.title: but fairly comfortable -good for kids
customer_reviews.text: For the money, it works quite well. Was a little hard to put together (the holes were not drilled correctly). Firm, but fairly comfortable -good for kids, or a guest when you haven't an extra bed.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not at all like what the product description explained
customer_reviews.text: Not at all like what the product description explained. Cheap faux "leather" and when I took the futon out of the box the back had a very large tear in the lining. Would not recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Do not buy this.
customer_reviews.text: This thing is not comfortable at all. It serves well as a temporary seat if you’re in someone’s hallway and you want to sit down while you wait for your friend to get ready, but in no way is the couch setting ideal for sitting down for long periods of time. And the bed setting is terrible. The middle part is stiff and it sticks up a bit, so when you lay down, you can’t get comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very uncomfortable to sit/lay on but looks nice
customer_reviews.text: This is a nice looking piece of furniture for the price but it is extremely uncomfortable to sit on or lay on and the armrests do not sit flat, they are always at an angle (see pic). There is no cushioning in the seats whatsoever, you can hear and feel the springs as soon as you sit down. Description says it converts to a full size bed, it's a lot smaller than that...only one adult can fit on it. Hoping I can return it.
customer_reviews.author: Deborah L. Watterson

customer_reviews.title: I've had this for less than 6 months and the ...
customer_reviews.text: I've had this for less than 6 months and the cup holder arm broke off and the fake leather is tearing at the bottom
customer_reviews.author: stefanie

customer_reviews.title: It's not great but it is ok. Look at other ones before buying this one
customer_reviews.text: It looks like it does in the picture. Other then that it is not that comfortable to sit on and it how's in the middle if you are a heavier person
customer_reviews.author: david schoeppe

customer_reviews.title: Very uncomfortable chair
customer_reviews.text: I like that it had a cup holder but the cup holder was not able to lay flat on the couch and because of that I’m unable to place my drink in it.
customer_reviews.author: Farski

customer_reviews.title: Okay for sitting, not so good for sleeping on.
customer_reviews.text: Not comfortable for sleeping on, even with two pads but it works fine for inexpensive additional seating in an apartment.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Cheaply made
customer_reviews.text: This didn't even last 3 days before it broke. The left arm of the couch broke or so we thought. The first time I went to put the arm down it fell off. I looked and the screws were busted off inside. I would not recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good for the price you pay
customer_reviews.text: Not super comfy or very big, but does the job. Super easy to assemble. Overall, I’m happy with it for the price, but it’s not a forever sofa.
customer_reviews.author: Mary Graci

customer_reviews.title: Not comfortable to sit / sleep on, arm rests don't sit level!
customer_reviews.text: It's not as comfortable as it looks. The pleather sticks to bare skin. The arm rests only sit level when the couch back is 90 degrees. I'd send this back but I don't feel like taking it apart and cramming it into a box.
customer_reviews.author: Paintmonkey

customer_reviews.title: It's just not very comfortable. The whole thing is hard with little cushioning
customer_reviews.text: It's just not very comfortable. The whole thing is hard with little cushioning, or maybe the cushioning is just not in the right places. Sitting on it for more than 10 or 20 minutes causes back pain and lots of shifting is needed to remain comfortable. Cup holders are pretty awesome though, they're what brought this up from a 1 star rating.
customer_reviews.author: Amy

customer_reviews.title: Looks nice, definitely not very comfortable after long periods of ...
customer_reviews.text: Looks nice, definitely not very comfortable after long periods of time. Planning on buying a mattress topper is anyone is planning on spending the night.
customer_reviews.author: Naulee

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: So comfortable! I use it at my cafe for a lounge & Hookah area at "4Chicks Cafe"
customer_reviews.author: Richard L.

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Assembly was fairly easy but arm rest are not level. Came assembled like that. Leather material is nice.
customer_reviews.author: Consumer Diva

customer_reviews.title: Arm rest
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to go in my Travel Trailer. It happen to fit in the opening where the dinette table was located and I wanted something to convert to a bed easier than the table. The arm rest to the futon are really flimsy and I don't see them holding up. other than that the futon is OK
customer_reviews.author: Donna Colley

customer_reviews.title: Great look, good for sitting, but quite firm.
customer_reviews.text: Great look, very sturdy but not very comfortable to lay on. Added a few blankets for padding and the teens can handle it.
customer_reviews.author: smokehaus

customer_reviews.title: Great for the cost!
customer_reviews.text: Looks classy in the man-cave. Not something you want to sit on or sleep on for any long period of time, however it's great for what you pay!
customer_reviews.author: Olivo Family

customer_reviews.title: Arrived abd Appeared Used
customer_reviews.text: Futon would have been nice had it not arrived with footprints all over it
customer_reviews.author: TLK

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: would have been 5 stars if the cup holders weren't so shallow. Took me 11 mins to put together.
customer_reviews.author: Phillip L. Salamacha

customer_reviews.title: Not that comfortable once you open it up
customer_reviews.text: Not that comfortable once you open it up,had to spend an additional 150.)) on a gel foam mattress to even it out.
customer_reviews.author: SGP

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: Not worth buying. Arm has already broken and the back leg is cracked in six months.
customer_reviews.author: Marie

customer_reviews.title: Nice product but mine came with a big rip in ...
customer_reviews.text: Nice product but mine came with a big rip in it. Buyer was quick to to replace it but was kind of a pain having to wait. Wouldn't hesitate to buy from them again though. Once I got the product I was very satisfied with it.
customer_reviews.author: Andy Petterson

customer_reviews.title: Easy to assemble, comfortable, and space-efficient
customer_reviews.text: It shipped quickly, was easy to assemble, and it's pretty comfortable to sit on/lie on. Moreover, converting it to the "bed form" is simple: just fully extend the back support forward, and you will be able to drop the back side to be parallel with the seating.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Okay
customer_reviews.text: Didnt have directions to find the directions hidden in the zipper at the bottom. The arm rests came off to easy

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: Too small and uncomfortable. Never buying furniture again from Amazon.com

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Looks just like the picture and easy put together. Love
customer_reviews.author: Barbara D.

customer_reviews.title: decent
customer_reviews.text: Came quick but the couch is kinda stiff and the cup holders don't sit level. For a cheap futon that arrives quick not a bad choice. One thing I like I'd one side can go down allowing another person to lay while the other sits.
customer_reviews.author: Reese

customer_reviews.title: Not verry comfortable. Bar in middle hurts when laying or sitting ...
customer_reviews.text: Not verry comfortable. Bar in middle hurts when laying or sitting down. Maybe folds out to a rwin soze bed.
customer_reviews.author: HunShel

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: Leg broke 2 days after we received it. Really not worth the money
customer_reviews.author: Sara McNeil

customer_reviews.title: Don't
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely awful! Hard as a rock and very uncomfortable. The arm rests don't fo down all the way and don't stay in place. I am very disappointed :-(
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie

customer_reviews.title: Not at all the "Best Choice" for any reason!
customer_reviews.text: Very cheaply made. Noticed a split seam and contacted the seller. They blamed it on damage in transit and refused to cover return postage. Upon further inspection we found the entire front of one side had separated from the particle board it was attached to. It is only attached by staples. One of the frame screws won't secure. And the arms won't sit flat. I don't expect fine furniture for $190 but I don't expect garbage either.
customer_reviews.author: Gary B

customer_reviews.title: I was hppy to know that it was easy to put together.
customer_reviews.text: I love the size and color but,the fold up arms are too loose.They still get 5 stars!

customer_reviews.title: ... hard and the angle of the back is not comfortable to
customer_reviews.text: it is okay but very hard and the angle of the back is not comfortable to me

customer_reviews.title: ... little hard to sleep on and the cup holders suck but it's easy to put together and it works ...
customer_reviews.text: It's a little hard to sleep on and the cup holders suck but it's easy to put together and it works great for a couch.

customer_reviews.title: It is comfortable to sit
customer_reviews.text: It was slightly damaged when I received the product. It is comfortable to sit, but lookwise not that much nice

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for our over the garage bonus room! Very comfortable and soooo easy to assemble!

customer_reviews.title: I loved this couch
customer_reviews.text: I loved this couch. It looks very elegant in my office. Might be a bit low but does its job

customer_reviews.title: Beware: As comfortable as a rock
customer_reviews.text: This couch is ungodly stiff. Just letting you know. Great price, but...ungodly stiff. -M

customer_reviews.title: Amazing sleep at night. Great lounging during the day.
customer_reviews.text: I've never slept as well as I do on this. Doesn't feel like it's overly sturdy, unfortunately, but I'm small, so it isn't a problem. It's very firm in a great way.

customer_reviews.title: and as such it was very easy for screws to loosen on their own
customer_reviews.text: All of the product arrived, assembly was fairly simple to figure out from instructions; however a few problems. Once assembled, the bed/couch is very wobbly The holes for the connector do not align properly, and as such it was very easy for screws to loosen on their own. The bed itself is not very comfortable, the padding is very hard and tough. Currently I'm primarily using as a couch, but even still I feel like it could fall apart at any moment. Some people mentioned the cupholders weren't large enough, I did not seem to have this problem, mine seemed to be large enough.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: It is definitely more of a couch than a bed but the option is swell..

I wouldn't want to use this for everyday / normal couch potato use, but for a basement multi purpose space for TV/Workout/Lounging, it serves it's purpose. It's a little "hard" when sitting on it. but it's size and weight make it ideal to move out of the way easily.

product_meta.title: Best Choice Products Leather Faux Fold Down Futon Lounge Convertible Sofa Bed Couch - Black
product_meta.description:
Upgrade any living space with a functional, modern futon tailored for relaxation. Designed with a soft, faux leather upholstery that includes 2 built-in cup holders and an adjustable backrest, this furniture piece caters to hours of comfort. It quickly converts into an oversized twin-size bed, coming in handy for overnight guests. Convenience and versatility are bonded perfectly with this multifunctional futon.

Specifications:
Overall Dimensions: 71"(L) 22"(W) 29.5"(H)
Bed Dimensions: 71"(L) 41"(W)
Sofa Backrest: 16"(H)
Floor-to-Seat: 14"(H)
Weight Capacity: 550 lbs.

feature_bullets: Simple yet contemporary composition makes this futon sofa the ideal furniture piece for any dorm room, bonus room, or other lounging area
Easily converts from a sofa to an oversized twin sleeper with 5 back level positions, allowing day or overnight guests to hang out in comfort
Lounge and watch your favorite sports or TV shows, as this futon conveniently has a built-in drink holder in each armrest for top notch relaxation
Made of smooth, easy-to-clean faux leather with detailed stitching, this functional futon can be maintained to cater to restful lounging for years to come
